00042 template<unsigned ELEMENT_DIM, unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00043 class AbstractMeshWriter
00044 {
00045 protected: // Give access of these members to subclasses
00046 
00047     OutputFileHandler* mpOutputFileHandler; 
00048     std::string mBaseName; 
00050     std::vector< std::vector<unsigned> > mBoundaryFaceData; 
00052     AbstractMeshReader<ELEMENT_DIM,SPACE_DIM>* mpMeshReader; 
00054     unsigned mNumNodes; 
00055     unsigned mNumElements; 
00056     unsigned mNumBoundaryElements; 
00058 public:
00059 
00067     AbstractMeshWriter(const std::string& rDirectory,
00068                        const std::string& rBaseName,
00069                        const bool clearOutputDir=true);
00070 
00074     virtual ~AbstractMeshWriter();
00075 
00079     std::string GetOutputDirectory();
00080 
00084     virtual unsigned GetNumNodes();
00085 
00089     unsigned GetNumElements();
00090 
00094     unsigned GetNumBoundaryFaces();
00095 
00099     unsigned GetNumBoundaryEdges();
00100 
00104     virtual std::vector<double> GetNextNode();
00105 
00106 
00110     virtual ElementData GetNextElement();
00111 
00112 
00118     void SetNextBoundaryFace(std::vector<unsigned> nextFace);
00119 
00124     virtual void WriteFiles()=0;
00125 
00131     void WriteFilesUsingMeshReader(AbstractMeshReader<ELEMENT_DIM, SPACE_DIM>& rMeshReader);
00132 
00133 };
